channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: No more Teslas with free, lifetime Standard Connectivity. Cloud services don‚Äôt come free and with one up-front ‚Äúhardware‚Äù purchase, this is a challenge for companies and their business models at scale. https://t.co/bcX0j4QBfL
item.source:markdown: No more Teslas with free, lifetime Standard Connectivity. Cloud services don‚Äôt come free and with one up-front ‚Äúhardware‚Äù purchase, this is a challenge for companies and their business models at scale. https://t.co/bcX0j4QBfL

item.description:
Woke up at 4am (not a rare occurrence these days) and decided to look deeper at #PopOS. My Dell XPS 15 has two NVME slots, so I threw a spare 256 GB SSD in there; no need to partition the Windows 11 drive. Pop is quite nice and approachable: love the auto-tiling feature. https://t.co/ejxhoyfps3

Different apps can be tabs within the same window too. Very nice!
item.source:markdown:
Woke up at 4am (not a rare occurrence these days) and decided to look deeper at #PopOS. My Dell XPS 15 has two NVME slots, so I threw a spare 256 GB SSD in there; no need to partition the Windows 11 drive. Pop is quite nice and approachable: *love* the auto-tiling feature. https://t.co/ejxhoyfps3
Different apps can be tabs within the same window too. Very nice!

item.description: Don‚Äôt like hearing a digital cricket that stunned itself after flying into a wall every time you send a Tweet? Settings > Accessibility > Display and sound > Sound effects OFF. https://t.co/ClBv1VPASY
